mapper.sql: CREATE SCHEMA IF NOT EXISTS dms;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS dms.purchase_blocks ( "height" bigint NOT NULL, "curBlock" VARCHAR(66) NOT NULL, "prevBlock" VARCHAR(66) NOT NULL, "merkleRoot" VARCHAR(66) NOT NULL, "timestamp" bigint NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY ("height") );

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS dms.purchase_transactions ( "purchaseId" VARCHAR(66) NOT NULL, "timestamp" bigint NOT NULL, "height" bigint NOT NULL, "hash" VARCHAR(66) NOT NULL, "contents" TEXT NOT NULL, "canceled" VARCHAR(1) DEFAULT 'N', "step" INTEGER DEFAULT 0, PRIMARY KEY ("purchaseId") );

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS dms.dms_signatures ( "height" bigint NOT NULL, "type" INTEGER NOT NULL, "branchIndex" INTEGER NOT NULL, "account" VARCHAR(42) NOT NULL, "signature" VARCHAR(66) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY ("height", "type", "branchIndex", "account") );
